Kirk, the changes you suggested got it to work on my computer.  It's 
a fun=
 demo.  It did improve, though I am sure it could do even better 
with some=
 optimization of the inputs and outputs.

Thanks for sharing; I really enjo=
yed it,

rote:

> Here's a couple of things to try:
> 
> In the parameter file AIPa=
c.param, find the Replicates parameter 
> which should be 10.  Set this to =
2.
> 
> You can also make the WindowRadius smaller.  It is currently 6 - 
t=
ry 
> 4 or 5.
> 
> Another option would be to set Replicates to 1, and Numb=
erOfGhosts 
> to 0.  This will have PacMan roaming around eating dots and 
=
PowerUps 
> with no ghotst like the example WMV I have.

ashes with these, I obviously have much more work to
